questions.question: Which of the following is an application of NN (Neural Network)?
A perceptron adds up all the weighted inputs it receives, and if it exceeds a certain value, it outputs a 1, otherwise it just outputs a 0.

answers.c: Sometimes - it can also output intermediate values as well

questions.question: Which of the following is not the promise of artificial neural network?

answers.b: It can survive the failure of some nodes
